name: Astrofield
description:
Test your (retro!) piloting skills

Pilot a spaceship through 10 zones of randomly spawned asteroids. From the excitement of near misses to the coming of an unforgivable onslaught, the only things you can count on are your piloting reflexes, and your dodge-roll maneuver. Easy to pickup, difficult to master, with a punishing one hit death system, every movement counts!

-----------Featuring-----------

- 2D skill based flight and dodge action!

- No weapons, just flying and dodging!

- Simple  controls!

 - Easy to play, difficult to master!

- 10 zones!

- 3 difficulty options!

- Relaxing and tense!

- Retro low-res pixel art!

- Over 20 color palettes!

- Supoort a solo indie dev!



------------Controls------------

---Move (Menu: move cursor / Gameplay: move ship)---

Keyboard:     WASD or up, left, down, right keys.

Controller:     Left Joystick, or D-PAD

---Action (Menu: select choice / Gameplay: dodge-roll)---

Keyboard:      E, Space, or Shift key.

Controller:     Xbox A, Playstation X, or Switch B

---Pause---

Keyboard:     Esc key

Controller:     Start button
